Description: Fragment of rectangular coffin showing different scenes and inscriptions in black pigment on a yellow background. A roughly drawn human figure (head missing) appears in the middle of the piece. The back of the fragment is undecorated. Three of the four edges of the fragments are clean cut (we cannot exclude they are original edges of the plank) and a thin layer of white deposit (plaster, gesso or paint?) covers the right end, while the upper edge shows tool marks.
